The Ol Mahum prefects possess a powerful magic. They have been known to burn their enemies alive! Ah, yes, the infamous Aura Burn! They are also masters of their staffs, and are strong enough to withstand attack by swords or clubs. Their only weakness is a susceptibility to magic spells...
